alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Halifax; Nash (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 12:25PM EDT until July 19 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Nash County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Edgecombe County in central North Carolina... South central Halifax County in central North Carolina... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1225 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dortches, or near Rocky Mount, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rocky Mount, Nashville, Dortches, Red Oak, Enfield, Whitakers, Leggett and Battleboro. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
